abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column on Texas Rangers catcher Mike Napoli, who helped lead team past Tampa Bay Rays, 4-3, in Game 3 of their American League division series.
snippet: The Angels wouldn’t trade Mike Napoli to the Rangers, a division rival, so Texas waited until Toronto dealt for him and then pounced.
lead_paragraph: The Angels wouldn’t trade Mike Napoli to the Rangers, a division rival, so Texas waited until Toronto dealt for him and then pounced.

headline.main: Rangers Glad They Got Their Man
headline.print_headline: Rangers Glad They Got Their Man
headline.seo: Rangers Glad They Got Their Man
